name: Testing With Node
body:
## Using node.js a an automated test engine
I'm using [node.js](http://nodejs.org/) rather than a dedicated testing suite to perform functional web testing with [webdriver-sync](https://github.com/jsdevel/webdriver-sync)and performance testing with [webpagetest](https://github.com/marcelduran/webpagetest-api).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
